author: Simon Difford
description: Gallnipper is a large mosquito so an appropriate name for this habanero-infused whiskey riff on the bourbon-based Cicada cocktail.
name: Gallnipper
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
